middleware.name: core-make
middleware.desc:
Core Make build system provides the make build files and scripts for building and programming ModusToolbox™ applications. Builds can be run either through a command-line interface (CLI) or through ModusToolbox™ Integrated Development Environment (IDE).
Additional Information:
  • Core Make build system README.md
  • Core Make build system RELEASE.md

middleware.name: mtb-pdl-cat2
middleware.desc:
The Peripheral Driver Library (PDL) simplifies software development for Category 2 devices. The PDL integrates device header files, startup code, and low-level peripheral drivers into a single package.
Additional Information:
  • CAT2 Peripheral Driver Library README.md
  • CAT2 Peripheral Driver Library RELEASE.md
  • CAT2 Peripheral Driver Library API reference guide

middleware.name: recipe-make-cat2
middleware.desc:
PSoC™ 4 Make build recipe provides the make files and scripts for building and programming PSoC™ 4 applications.
Additional Information:
  • CAT2 Make build recipe README.md
  • CAT2 Make build recipe RELEASE.md

middleware.name: core-lib
middleware.desc: The Core Library provides device agnostic utilities that all middleware can rely on. This includes a generic result type and some common utility functions.

middleware.name: capsense
middleware.desc: Capacitive sensing solution (CapSense) enabling a variety of applications such as touch, gesture and proximity detection.

middleware.name: device-db
middleware.desc: Device database provides device information for project-creator, configurators, and other tools.
